Package io.github.aenyeweddientwink

Class RecordBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.aenyeweddientwink.RecordBook
  • public class RecordBook
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for a Record Book. It contains credits and marks of a certain student Attributes: Name - name of the student Surname - surname of the student Records - list of records of the student Semester - current semester QualificationScore - score of the qualification work
